title: Summary
text: Greek National Data bank Hydrological Meteorological Information, Hydroscope [@hydroscope2018], result long-standing efforts numerous Greek scientists collaboration various companies associations. main purpose formation basic infrastructure implementation European Community Directives 2000/60/EC (.e. establishment framework Community action field water policy) 2007/60/EC, (.e. assessment management flood risks). Hydroscope offers several national data sources HTML plain text files via web interface, using Enhydris database system [@christofides2011enhydris]. data well structured Greek, thus limiting usefulness. Furthermore, fully reproducible research [@peng2011reproducible] can tedious error-prone using Hydroscope’s web interface. contrary, using Enhydris API reproducibility requires external programs scripting import data. hydroscoper [@hydroscoper2018] provides functionality automatic retrieval translation Hydroscope’s data English use R [@Rbase]. main functions can utilized family functions, get_stations, get_timeseries, get_data, etc., easily download JSON TXT files tidy data frames [@Wickham2014]. internal databases package can used run queries available stations time series, reducing time needed downloading data wrangling [@kandel2011research], data rarely modified. data many applications. general, availability meteorological hydrological information essential water resources management, water quality assessment global change studies [@vafiadis1994hydroscope]. Also, data can used researchers forward studies specific requirements time series required, estimation rainfall erosivity [@vantas_sid2017]. Finally, data crucial Greek organizations implementation Water Framework Directive 2000-2027 [@WFD].

title: hydroscoper 1.0.0 (Release date: 2018-03-16)
text: CRAN release: 2018-03-16 hydroscoper transferred rOpenSci: https://github.com/ropensci/hydroscoper General major update. functions rewritten utilizing Enhydris API. included data package cover Hydroscope’s databases. Add vignettes “introduction hydroscoper” “Using hydroscoper’s data”. Add package documentation site. Use pingr package check sub-domain alive. functions return tibbles. Add greece_borders dataset. New functionality: get_instruments() returns tibble instruments’ data. get_water_basins() returns tibble Water Basins’ data. get_water_divisions() returns tibble Water Divisions’ data. get_political_divisions() returns tibble Political Divisions’ data. get_variables() returns tibble Variables’ data. get_units_of_measurement() returns tibble Units’ data. get_time_steps() returns tibble Time Steps’ data. get_owners() returns tibble Owners’ data. get_instruments_type()returns tibble Instruments’ type data. get_station_type() returns tibble Water Basins data. get_database() returns tibble Water Basins data. hydro_coords returns tibble stations’ longitudes latitudes using input variable point get_stations function. hydro_translate() translates various Greek terms English. Changes get_stations get_timeseries use Enhydris API considerably faster. get_data uses lower case variable naming: date, value, comment Defuncs get_coords removed package. Please use hydro_coords convert Hydroscope’s points’ raw format tibble.
